description: Jane is a dedicated teacher at Oakwood Elementary who oversees the class known as the "Oakwood Owlets."
relationship: Her primary contacts in this scene are the parents of her students: Emily Johnson (mother of Oliver Johnson and PTA member), Michael Smith (father of Emma Smith and school event volunteer), Laura Brown (single mother of Sam Brown), Robert Garcia (father of Isabella Garcia and fundraiser participant), and Sarah Lee (mother of Jayden Lee and book-club organizer).
